job_description:
Vice President of Sales Operations

About the Company

Reputable healthcare specialist staffing agency

Industry
Staffing and Recruiting

Type
Privately Held

About the Role

The Vice President of Sales Operations will be responsible for leading and mentoring a high-performing team of professionals as well as establishing comprehensive sales strategies.

Travel Percent
Less than 10%

Functions
• Sales/Revenue
• Operations

Known Requirements
• Extensive experience leading sales teams required
• In-depth knowledge of P&L management processes required
• Bachelor's degree in sales, business administration, or equivalent field required
• Exceptional negotiation skills required

Qualifications: Extensive experience leading sales teams required
In-depth knowledge of P&L management processes required
Bachelor's degree in sales, business administration, or equivalent field required
Responsibilities: The Vice President of Sales Operations will be responsible for leading and mentoring a high-performing team of professionals as well as establishing comprehensive sales strategies
